Posts.Content: Dear Nic till, Please tell your husband not to rush into surgery just yet. Being "scared to death" is an indication you need to step back as a couple and take time to carefully review ALL your options. When together you have made the right decision, whether it is surgery or not, your fears will fade, I promise. See my post on 9/7/12 at: http://www.cancerforums.net/threads/...gnosed-on-8-27
Posts.Title: Surgery scheduled Scared to death - help
